mapper.select: select ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME from oit_user_center.oit_role where ID = #{id}
select ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME from oit_user_center.oit_role limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into oit_user_center.oit_role(ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{roleName}, #{roleType}, #{companyId}, #{company}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.update:
update oit_user_center.oit_role
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName},
ROLE_TYPE = #{roleType},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId},
COMPANY = #{company},
STATUS = #{status},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
where ID = #{id}
